mapper.insert: insert into channel (CHNL_ID, CHNL_TTL, CHNL_INTRO, CHNL_URI, CHNL_SB_TTL, CHNL_IMG_PATH, SUBER_CNT, CHNL_POST_CNT, CHNL_LIK_CNT, CHNL_OPEN_DTM, CRT_ID, HMPG_URL, INSTA_URL, GITH_URL, YTB_URL, TWCH_URL, CHNL_STUS_CD, CHNL_STUS_CHGR_ID, CHNL_STUS_CHG_DTM) VALUES (#{chnlId}, #{chnlTtl}, #{chnlIntro}, #{chnlUri}, #{chnlSbTtl}, #{chnlImgPath}, #{suberCnt}, #{chnlPostCnt}, #{chnlLikCnt}, NOW(), #{crtId}, #{hmpgUrl}, #{instaUrl}, #{githUrl}, #{ytbUrl}, #{twchUrl}, #{chnlStusCd}, #{chnlStusChgrId}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE channel SET CHNL_URI = #{chnlUri}, CHNL_TTL = #{chnlTtl}, CHNL_IMG_PATH = #{chnlImgPath}, CHNL_INTRO = #{chnlIntro}, CHNL_SB_TTL = #{chnlSbTtl} WHERE CHNL_ID = #{chnlId};
mapper.select: select exists(select 1 from channel where chnl_uri = #{chnlUri}) AND
mapper.update: update channel set CHNL_STUS_CD = "ST00220" where CHNL_ID = #{chnlId} AND
mapper.select: SELECT channel.CHNL_ID, channel.CHNL_TTL, channel.CHNL_INTRO, channel.CHNL_URI, channel.CHNL_SB_TTL, channel.CHNL_IMG_PATH, channel.SUBER_CNT, channel.CHNL_POST_CNT, channel.CHNL_LIK_CNT, channel.CHNL_OPEN_DTM, user1.NIC as crtNic, channel.HMPG_URL, channel.INSTA_URL, channel.GITH_URL, channel.YTB_URL, channel.TWCH_URL, channel.CHNL_STUS_CHG_DTM FROM channel INNER JOIN user AS user1 ON channel.CRT_ID = user1.USER_ID INNER JOIN common_code ON channel.CHNL_STUS_CD = common_code.CD INNER JOIN user AS user2 ON channel.CHNL_STUS_CHGR_ID = user2.USER_ID WHERE CRT_ID = #{userId} AND
